name: Gossip Beach
description:
Hi! This a little prototype of a "Where is Waldo?"-like game.

The goal is to find the 2 lovers  and drag and drop them in their respective squares on the right of the screen. Focus on the color of their clothes and the shape and color of their hair.

Sometimes, a sun umbrella will appear and bother you but don't be afraid you can see what's underneath when you move your mouse over it. 

There is two game modes: Chill & Challenge.

  • Chill: Take your time to find the maximum of couples until you are bored. :)
  • Challenge: You have 30 seconds to find a couple. Time resets every time you succed. 

Good Luck ! \o/
